name: Stay in the line plus-Step In The Line
name_original: Stay in the line plus-Step In The Line
description:
Stay in the line by dragging your ball.
How long can you stay in the line?


[How To Play]
^Tap & Drag to Move^
Drag finger to move and don't move out of lines.
You must hold the ball stay in the line.
If the ball not stay in the line,you will lose game.
